DOC.brief_summary: A randomize , control study safety efficacy Squalamine Lactate Eye Drops combination Ranibizumab intravitreal injection patient diabetic macular edema . The study duration 52 week patient randomize one four treatment arm .
DOC.brief_title: Squalamine Lactate Eye Drops Combination With Ranibizumab Patients With Diabetic Macular Edema ( DME )
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , control study safety efficacy Squalamine Lactate eye drop combination Ranibizumab intravitreal injection patient diabetic macular edema . Subjects randomize one follow treatment arm : 1 . Squalamine Lactate Ophthalmic Solution administer twice day 52 week combination monthly injection ranibizumab baseline week 20 ranibizumab need week 24 week 52 . 2 . Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administer twice day 52 week combination monthly injection ranibizumab baseline week 20 ranibizumab need week 24 week 52 . 3 . Squalamine Lactate Ophthalmic Solution administer four time day 52 week combination monthly injection ranibizumab baseline week 20 ranibizumab need week 24 week 52 . 4 . Vehicle Ophthalmic Solution administer four time day 52 week combination monthly injection ranibizumab baseline week 20 ranibizumab need week 24 week 52 .
DOC.criteria: Subjects clinically significant diabetic macular edema ≥ 300 micron central involvement use Heidelberg Cirrus machine Best correct visual acuity 20/32 20/320 inclusive study eye Adults ≥ 18 year age type 1 2 diabetes mellitus diabetic macular edema History vitreoretinal surgery study eye Panretinal laser photocoagulation macular laser photocoagulation study eye within 3 month screen Any prior laser study eye Previous use intraocular periocular corticosteroid study eye within 6 month screen Previous treatment antiangiogenic drug either eye within 3 month screen Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus HbA1c level great 12 Ocular disorder study eye , diabetic macular edema , confound interpretation study result
